mapper.select: SELECT id as id, major_id as majorId, direction as direction, proportion as proportion, major_total as majorTotal, English_total as englishTotal, subjective_question as subjectiveQuestion, objective_question as objectiveQuestion, question_num as questionNum, time_restrict as timeRestrict, listening as listening, reading as reading, writing as writing, English_other as englishOther, team_discussion as teamDiscussion, question_answer as questionAnswer, translation as translation, oral_other as oralOther, paper as paper, college_from as collegeFrom, edu_background as eduBackground FROM retest WHERE majorId=#{majorId}
